stanza.line: Beshrew that heart that makes my heart togroan
For that deep wound it gives my friend and me
Ist not enough to torture mealone
But slave to slavery my sweet friend mustbe
Me from my self thy cruel eye hathtaken
And my next self thou harder hast engrossed
Of him my self and thee I amforsaken
A torment thrice three fold thus to be crossed
Prison my heart in thy steel bosom ward
But then my friend heart let my poor heart bail
Whoeer keeps me let my heart be his guard
Thou canst not then use rigour in my gaol
And yet thou wilt for I being pent inthee
Perforce am thine and all that is inme
